resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
igor-suhorukov opened a new pull request, #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973

   Support ORC file format in java Dataset API

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#issuecomment-1227679920

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

igor-suhorukov commented on PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#issuecomment-1238209893

   Hi @davisusanibar or @lwhite1 
   Any comments? 
   I am ready to work on next PRs related to #14039 after merge of current PR into master branch

davisusanibar commented on PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#issuecomment-1238245869

   > Hi @davisusanibar or @lwhite1 Any comments? I am ready to work on next PRs related to #14039 after merge of current PR into master branch
   
   Hi @igor-suhorukov let me review this today, sorry for the long time

lidavidm commented on code in PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#discussion_r965217957


##########
java/dataset/pom.xml:
##########
@@ -109,6 +109,38 @@
             <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
             <scope>test</scope>
         </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.apache.arrow.orc</groupId>
+            <artifactId>arrow-orc</artifactId>

Review Comment:
   Is this dependency actually used? I see the ORC library but not the Arrow ORC adapter

igor-suhorukov commented on code in PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#discussion_r965245125


##########
java/dataset/pom.xml:
##########
@@ -109,6 +109,38 @@
             <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
             <scope>test</scope>
         </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.apache.arrow.orc</groupId>
+            <artifactId>arrow-orc</artifactId>

Review Comment:
   @lidavidm sure! If comment this dependency: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/client/HdfsDataOutputStream$SyncFlag
   ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10332206/188971638-b8c4b8eb-9074-445e-b57d-4b5a71c0655d.png)

lidavidm commented on code in PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#discussion_r965248473


##########
java/dataset/pom.xml:
##########
@@ -109,6 +109,38 @@
             <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
             <scope>test</scope>
         </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.apache.arrow.orc</groupId>
+            <artifactId>arrow-orc</artifactId>

Review Comment:
   It _seems_ like that's just a transitive dependency that needs to get pulled in…but since this is a test-only dependency it's ok then.

lidavidm commented on PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#issuecomment-1239845562

   Integration test failure should be unrelated, see #14069

igor-suhorukov commented on PR #13973:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13973#issuecomment-1239873727

   Thank you @lidavidm and @davisusanibar 
   Yes, looks like by CI log details
